content:
# The error indicates that I do not have any coal left in my inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace. It seems that I used all of my coal during the previous smelting processes.

# To continue, I need to gather more coal before I can smelt the Copper Ore. 

# I will locate the nearest Coal resource and harvest some coal.

coal_position = nearest(Resource.Coal)  # Locate the nearest Coal resource
move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the Coal resource location
harvest_resource(coal_position, quantity=10)  # Gather more Coal from the resource patch
print(f"Inventory after gathering coal: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check current inventory after gathering Coal

# After gathering coal, I will return to the Stone Furnace and proceed with smelting the Copper Ore again.
